title: Linear algebra
text:
Properties of vector spaces

Definition 1 (Linear combination) Let \(u,v \in V, a,b \in F \Rightarrow a u + b v \in V\)


Give a subset \(S\) of a vector space \(V\), the set of all linear combinations of elements of \(S\) is also a vector space. This set is called the span of \(S\) and is denoted by \(\text{span}(S)\).


Definition 2 (Subspace) The subset \(W\) of \(V\) is a subspace of \(V\) if \(W\) is a vector space.


Theorem 1 The set \(W\) is a subspace of \(V\) if and only if \(W\) satisfies clausure property under addition and scalar multiplication.

title: Abel Alvarez
text: Professor Abel concentrates his research on mathematical modeling and computer methods for the numerical solution of fluid dynamic equations in heterogeneous porous media. His research focuses on the creation of novel numerical methods for solving hyperbolic partial differential equations, with applications to nonconventional one and two-dimensional transport systems. This type of research has numerous engineering applications, such as increased oil recovery, aquifer cleansing, and epidemic modeling.
